item.title: Suspect arrested in pipe bomb incident on eve of Jan 6, ending years-long manhunt
item.description: The bombs were placed the night before the 6 January riots, and were discovered as rioters began to storm the Capitol.

item.title: Putin says Russia will take Donbas by force or Ukraine's troops will withdraw
item.description: The Russian leader's comments come as US and Ukrainian negotiators are due to hold a new round of talks.

item.title: Ireland among countries boycotting Eurovision after Israel allowed to compete
item.description: There had been calls for Israel's exclusion over the war in Gaza, as well as unfair voting accusations.

item.title: Israel strikes south Lebanon after first direct talks in decades
item.description: The Israeli military says it struck Hezbollah sites, less than 24 hours after Israel and Lebanon sent civilian envoys to meet.

item.title: Trump hosts signing of peace deal between leaders of DR Congo and Rwanda
item.description: The US president hopes that a peace deal will pave the way for greater American investment in the resource-rich region.
